name: Ananke
description:
Ananke is an adventure game which started as en entry for the #adventurejam 2015. Sadly, life and other issues got in the way and it couldn't be finished in time.

After a bit more work, the game is now in a playable state and corresponds more or less to what I had in mind for the jam, that is a narrative experience and a prototype for something bigger. It has bugs, gameplay flaws and narrative issues but I still hope you'll enjoy the unique feel.

The game is quite self explanatory (and the discovery of the game is part of itself) so just try it and see what you can do with it. I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Mouse: Look / Interact

WASD: Move

Tab: Inventory

Esc: Pause

Credits:

Renaud Despinois: Design, Story, Programming, Additionnal Art, Music, Sounds

Jonathan Romero Ruiz: Art, Animation
